channel.title: Hosting problems can someone help please?
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300][size=30pt]I got someone willing to host my server for me, every time i send it to him and when he extracts it it goes bak to how the server was before i coded it...
Can someone help?[/size][/glow]

item.title: Hosting problems can someone help please?
item.dc:creator: @joe1993 joe1993
item.description:
@joe1993 wrote:

[table][tr][td]Perhaps your “host” has stolen your source and is redistributing it as his own?
[/table]
cant he like live basicly nxt door ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 26, 2006, 04:11:36 AM[/size][hr]how do i compile the files…?

Read full topic

compile the files

send the zipped folder.
